comments:
The information system (BDII) does not deliver any information any more. When trying to use the Glue Information Viewer to show information about the Grid the nodes are empty. The same applies to the VO node in the Grid Project View. When trying to directly select the BDII service in the Glue Information View via the context menu the following exception occures:
